feature.label: The Eclipse Bio-PEPA Plug-in
feature.description: The Bio-PEPA editor is the ever evolving Eclipse Plug-in for the Bio-PEPA language. Currently it supports analysis via simulation or ODEs, but future work will bring support for CTMC analysis via levels.
